PolicyPage.Name: Midnight 5K Rules
PolicyPage.Title: Midnight 5K Rules
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
Rule 1: Race

Check-In

Participants will compete individually in a 5 Kilometer Race around the BYU-Idaho Campus.

Check in will begin at 11:00pm Friday night at the Stadium Entrance (South Side in Hart Parking Lot). Race will be begin at 12:00am and will end at 12:45am.

 

In order to participate in any RecSports Event, all participants must show a valid I-card or present their I-number. If the individual does not have your I-card or I-number they will not be allowed to participate.

 

Course

Students will run a course below unless otherwise instructed do to construction or course obstacles.

 

5K Map Directions (Upper Fields Route) Estimated 3.1 miles

•·         Begin at the Stadium on the west side in the middle of the track and circle the track once going clockwise.

•·         Leave the stadium by heading south and take a right on 2nd South St.

•·         When you reach 1st East St. take a right onto it.

•·         When you reach 3rd South St. take a left onto it.

•·         When you reach 2nd East St. take a right onto it.

•·         Take a right after the first set of dorms (they are on your right) you pass and go down the road (you will be between the dorms).

•·         Go left after the dorms and travel north between the Kimball building and the parking lot.

•·         Continue on past the Hinckley building (which will be on your left).

•·         Go around the Gardens travelling with the Ricks building on your left.

•·         Continue around the Gardens with the Benson building on your left.

•·         Turn left immediately after the Benson building so that you the front of the Benson building on your left and the parking lot on your right.

•·         Take a left onto South Center St. (you will be travelling north).

•·         About midway past the Upper Fields (which on your right) cut through them travelling northwest.

•·         Upon reaching the pathway near the boundaries of the field follow it  as it turns southward.

•·         After going around some trees in the middle of the field go through the gate on your left, this will put you on 1st West St., continue travelling south.

•·         When you reach West Viking Dr. take a right.

•·         Take a left heading south toward the stadium just before the M.C. building.

•·         Travel south passing the M.C. building (on your right) and the I-Center (on your left).

•·         Continue south passing the McKay building (on your right) and the Hart building (on your left).

•·         Take a left after the Hart building and travel west.  The Hart building will be on your left and the parking lot and stadium will be on your right.

•·         Take a right onto 1st West St. (heading south)

•·         Take a right at the 4 way stop and travel up 2nd South St.

•·         Take a right upon reaching the gate entrance to the stadium and travel north to the finish line where you began.

 

5k Map Directions (Hinckley Parking Lot) Estimated 3.1 miles

•·         Begin at the Stadium on the west side in the middle of the track and circle the track once going clockwise.

•·         Leave the stadium by heading south and take a right on 2nd South St.

•·         When you reach 1st East St. take a right onto it.

•·         When you reach 3rd South St. take a left onto it.

•·         When you reach 2nd East St. take a right onto it.

•·         Runners will run South on Second East (2nd East) towards the Rexburg Temple. 

•·         They will then run along the Hinckley Parking lot through designated markers taking a sidewalk path near the Orchards out to Seventh South (7th South).

•·         Runners will then head West towards the Fields until they reach First West (1st West).

•·         Runners will continue down First West until they reach West Viking (Before BYU-Idaho Center)

•·         When you reach West Viking Dr. take a right.

•·         Take a left heading south toward the stadium just before the M.C. building.

•·         Travel south passing the M.C. building (on your right) and the I-Center (on your left).

•·         Continue south passing the McKay building (on your right) and the Hart building (on your left).

•·         Take a left after the Hart building and travel west.  The Hart building will be on your left and the parking lot and stadium will be on your right.

•·         Take a right onto 1st West St. (heading south)

•·         Take a right at the 4 way stop and travel up 2nd South St.

•·         Take a right upon reaching the gate entrance to the stadium and travel north to the finish line where you began.

  

Costumes (Halloween 5K)

The following is not appropriate for costumes and runners will be asked to change or leave the event until they comply with the Dress and Grooming Standards.

•·         Face paint must not cover the face

•·         Tight or revealing clothing in not permitted

•·         Cross Dress (Men dressed as Women, Women dressed as Men)

•·         Do not wear clothing or costumes that will endanger you or another participant

  

Safety

Runners are responsible for their own safety. Security and Volunteer Staff will be around the course to help direct runners and respond to any of their safety needs, however as pedestrians please be aware of other hazards such as cars, construction or anything else that could bring you in harm's way.

  

5K Shirts

Participants may purchase event shirts for $10 at the beginning of the race. Necessary information includes participant's full name, campus email, i-number and signature of understanding that your shirt purchase will be charged to your student account. Shirts will not be ordered until after the race. Pick up dates will be announced through email and available to you in the Activities Office (MC 101).
